sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都有"熟练的"之意。
means: expert ： 特指有某项专长，有某方面经验。
proficient ： 多指擅长于某事，侧重技艺或科学方面。
skillful ： 指在工作或操作中表现出灵巧、熟练。
skilled ： 通常指已掌握某行业的专业技能或手段，或已有从事某一专门工作的本领或技术。

sentence.Network_en: Computers and electronics are growth industries and need skilled technicians.
sentence.Network_cn: 计算机与电子行业属于蓬勃发展的产业，需要娴熟的技术人员。

sentence.Network_en: He is a hard worker and a skilled gardener.
sentence.Network_cn: 他工作很努力，对园艺很在行。

sentence.Network_en: A high proportion of the new arrivals are skilled professionals.
sentence.Network_cn: 新来的人中很大一部分是技术熟练的专业人士。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... vague a. 含糊的；不明确的 skilled a. 熟练的；有技能的 prospect n. 展望，景象；［常.
自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... vague a. 含糊的；不明确的 skilled a. 熟练的；有技能的 prospect n. 展望，景象；［常.
娴_百度百科 ... 娴静【 demure;be gentle and refined】 娴熟【 adept;skilled;dexterous】 娴雅【 (of a woman) refined;elegant】.
职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... skill 技能，技巧 skilled 熟练的，需要技能的 skilful 灵巧的，熟练的.

list.abs: 沟通技巧（Communication Skills）是一类，其目的是帮助学生更好地与英语为母语的沟通，让他们有更多的工具的词汇表达和成语， …
丸井文太_百度百科 ... MTOXICOSIS（ 中毒） UNIQUE SKILL（ 绝招（unique skill）） VICTORY（ 胜利）.
活动详情 ... A组第二册：实践与进步 Practice & Progress B组第三册：培养技能 Developing Skills.
成人怎样学英语，成年人应该怎样学习英语最快。 ... Oral English 口语 Reading skills 阅读 Writing skills 写作.

entry.tran: 有技术的;有技能的;熟练的
entry.def: Someone who is skilled has the knowledge and ability to do something well.

example.ex: Not all doctors are skilled in helping their patients make choices.
example.tran: 并非所有医生都善于帮助病人作出正确选择。

example.ex: ...a network of amateur but highly skilled observers of wildlife.
example.tran: 由一批知识丰富的业余野生动植物观察者组成的网络

entry.tran: 需要熟练技术的;需要专门技能的
entry.def: Skilled work can only be done by people who have had some training.

example.ex: New industries demanded skilled labour not available locally.
example.tran: 新行业所需的技术工人在当地是找不到的。

example.ex: ...skilled workers, such as plumbers and electricians.
example.tran: 管道工和电工等技术工人

means.word_mean: 1. having or showing or requiring special skill;

sentences.sentence: "only the most skilled gymnasts make an Olympic team"
"a skilled surgeon has many years of training and experience"
"a skilled reconstruction of her damaged elbow"

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, demand for skilled labor continues to grow.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, demand for skilled labor continues to grow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, demand for skilled labor continues to grow.

auth_sentence.content: Think Spain's tiki-taka only with less skilled players.
auth_sentence.res_content: Think Spain's tiki-taka only with less skilled players.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Think Spain's tiki-taka only with less skilled players.

auth_sentence.content: But even in a knowledge-based economy, low-skilled work survives.
auth_sentence.res_content: But even in a knowledge-based economy, low-skilled work survives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But even in a knowledge-based economy, low-skilled work survives.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常在动词后,"有……的,被……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通常的,习惯的,按照风俗习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accustom使习惯+ed有……的,被……的→通常的,习惯的
ally同盟者+ed有……的,被……的→allied联合的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耕耘的,有教养的,栽植的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cultivate耕耘,栽植+ed有……的,被……的→cultivated耕耘的
harden变硬+ed有……的,被……的→adj.变硬的,坚毅的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受伤的,受损害的,受委屈的
感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest兴趣,关心+ed有……的,被……的→adj.感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
limit限制+ed有……的,被……的→adj.有限的,被限制的
note注意到+ed有……的,被……的→被注意的→著名的
pack打包+ed有……的,被……的→adj.充满……的,塞满了……的
repeat重复,反复+ed有……的,被……的→adj.重复的,再三的
suppose猜想,推测+ed有……的,被……的→adj.假定的,假像的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wick+ed有……的,被……的→adj.坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
fix固定+ed有……的,被……的→adj.固定的,确定的

Sentence.sentence: Skilled workforce in the hilly region

Manufacturing's shrinking presence undoubtedly helps explain the decline in craftsmanship, if only because many of the nation's assembly line workers were skilled in craft work, if not on the job then in their spare time
the sociologist Ruth Milkman of City University of New York found that many line workers, in their off-hours, did home renovation and other skilled work.

jushi.english: A skilled worker can perform the task easily.
jushi.chinese: 熟练工人可轻易地完成任务。
这是一项需要高度技能的工作。

jushi.english: Dr. Petrie is skilled in surgery.
jushi.chinese: 彼特里医生外科技术熟练。
